SEARCH
Package utils

Class Driver

java.lang.Object
utils.Driver
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseTest
public class Driver extends Object
Class used for Driver configuration. Uses ThreadLocal class for paralel execution. The WebDriver objects it`s instantiated through ThreadLocal class to ensure thread safety The browser to be instantiated is decided through method parameter that will be provided on method call Ex: in BaseTest class, the method initDriver() is called and browser is passed as parameter from test-ng.xml

  • Method Details

    • initBrowser

      public org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver initBrowser(String browser)
      Browser configuration method. Takes browser as parameter and makes the driver setup through WebDriverManager dependency (pom.xml)
      Parameters:
      browser - (currently setup with Google Chrome, Mozzila Firefox and Microsoft Edge) New browsers can be added on the existing model
      Returns:
      browser instance browser configuration is set through the option methods (getChromeOptios, getFirefoxOptions, getEdgeOptions)

    • getChromeOptions

      public static org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeOptions getChromeOptions()
      Method used for specific Chrome browser configuration. It is being used when the browser is setup in the initBrowser() method
      Returns:
      option object that is used inside driver initialisation Ex : driver.set(new ChromeDriver(getChromeOptions())); Full list of chrome arguments : https://peter.sh/experiments/chromium-command-line-switches/

    • getFirefoxOptions

      public static org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxOptions getFirefoxOptions()
      Method used for specific Firefox browser configuration. It is being used when the browser is setup in the initBrowser() method
      Returns:
      option object that is used inside driver initialisation Ex : driver.set(new FirefoxDriver(getFirefoxOptions()));

    • getEdgeOptions

      public static org.openqa.selenium.edge.EdgeOptions getEdgeOptions()
      Method used for specific Edge browser configuration. It is being used when the browser is setup in the initBrowser() method
      Returns:
      option object that is used inside driver initialisation Ex : driver.set(new EdgeDriver(getEdgeOptions()));
